name: SpacePortal - AugmentedReality
description:
You like pokemon-go?
Then you will love this free augmented reality application!

The Aliens are using the SpacePortal to come in our world! Are you tough enough to defend your location?


FEATURES:

-Augmented Reality in 360-DEGREE
-Free download
-Very real effects
-Numerous weapons and enemies
-Ingame Shop to buy weapons and monition (everything for free!)
